episodes.synopsis: On the vibrant world of Caprica, two dynamic families live on opposite ends of society until they are brought together by tragedy. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On the vibrant world of Caprica, two dynamic families live on opposite ends of society until they are brought together by tragedy. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After the bombing, Daniel tries to figure out why he can only create a single intelligent robot, not understanding a part of Zoe survived.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: Following Amanda's public revelation that her daughter was responsible for the MagLev tragedy, the Graystones must face the wrath of angry Capricans.
episodes.title: Reins of a Waterfall

episodes.synopsis: After ordering the death of Amanda Graystone, Joseph is wracked with a heavy conscience and desperately tries to stop Sam from carrying out the hit.
episodes.title: Gravedancing

episodes.synopsis: Tamara Adama's avatar wanders V-World, unaware she died. Tamara befriends a gamer and learns a devastating secret that threatens everything she knows.
episodes.title: There is Another Sky

episodes.synopsis: Rival industrialist Tomas Vergis arrives on Caprica, threatening to reveal proof that Daniel stole the chip that is key to the U-87 Cylon.
episodes.title: Know Thy Enemy

episodes.synopsis: A dark secret from Amanda's past could have major implications on her life with Daniel. Joseph asks Heracles to help him find Tamara's avatar.
episodes.title: The Imperfections of Memory

episodes.synopsis: Daniel suspects Zoe's avatar is in the robot, but she refuses to reveal herself. To flush her out, he launches a campaign of psychological torture.
episodes.title: Ghosts in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: When Daniel sets a deadline to reset the U-87 Cylon -- unknowingly ending Zoe-A's existence as she knows it -- she desperately tries to save herself.
episodes.title: End of Line

episodes.synopsis: Daniel must put his life back together in the wake of Zoe's escape, Amanda's plummet and the U-87 Cylon's murder of a lab technician.
episodes.title: Unvanquished

episodes.synopsis: Sister Clarice ruthlessly wields her new power as head of the Caprican STO as she aims to finish her war with Barnabas once and for all.
episodes.title: Retribution

episodes.synopsis: Zoe's search for Tamara ends, and Zoe is shocked to see what Tamara has become. Lacy struggles to keep Zoe's secrets amidst Clarice's torture.
episodes.title: Things We Lock Away

episodes.synopsis: The conflict that orphaned the Adama brothers has reignited, and the turmoil now extends to Caprica. Sam does his part, sending guns to his homeworld.
episodes.title: False Labor

episodes.synopsis: When their flight is hijacked, Lacy and STO recruit Odin Sinclair must keep the passengers together and organize a rebellion before time runs out.
episodes.title: Blowback

episodes.synopsis: When Daniel offers to send aid to Tauron's rebel fighters, the Adamas are forced into a difficult decision. Zoe and Tamara clean up New Cap City.
episodes.title: Dirteaters

episodes.synopsis: At the STO camp, Lacy unexpectedly commands a U-87 Cylon, and it obeys. In fact, all the Cylons now obey only her. The STO suspects Lacy is a threat.
episodes.title: The Heavens Will Rise

episodes.synopsis: Sam, Daniel and Amanda make one last effort to find Zoe and Tamara. Wearing holobands at home, they are unaware Clarice has broken into the house.
episodes.title: Here Be Dragons

episodes.synopsis: The Graystones must stop the attack at Atlas Arena. Framed as terrorists, the family learns the truth about Apotheosis is worse than they feared.
episodes.title: Apotheosis

video.title: Caprica
video.synopsis: Set on planet Caprica, this "Battlestar Galactica" prequel series follows the work of a grieving tech tycoon and his complex cyborg inventions.
